title: Download Size? (Including Patches)
body: I have a computer with a very small hard drive, and I only have about 8 GB left on it. Would that be enough to download League and all of the patches?

replies.body:
8GB may be *just enough* to squeeze League in, as the install of League is about that size, however, filling your disk up *that full* will likely create a **dramatic performance drop** for your system. 

I'd recommend clearing up some additional disk space using an application like [CCleaner](https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner) or [Glary Utilities](http://www.glarysoft.com/glary-utilities/) before installing League.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I still have some small applications I could delete, and I'll hopefully get somewhere near 9GB if I do.
Plus, if it ends up running slowly, I could always lower the graphics settings.
Thanks for your help
